BIO

I am a passionate Computer Engineer Technology student who always excited in programming and solving real world problems. Has a genuine curiosity in technology, leadership and economy Has a great experience writing code in Java and C programming language. I has experienced developing android application using Android studio along with good command in HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, SQL, Assembly language and Shell Scripting. Knowledgeable in data bases, networking technology and embedded system A quick learner and highly motivated individual. Self-taught coder with strong work-ethic.
